question: 亮平
sourceMnemonic:
<kanji>Clear</kanji> <kanji>flat</kanji> is one way to write the Japanese given name <vocabulary>Ryohei</vocabulary>. 

Some well-known people with the name include metal sculptor Miyada Ryohei (<ja>宮田 亮平</ja>), actor Suzuki Ryohei (<ja>鈴木 亮平</ja>), and model and actor Ōtani Ryohei (<ja>大谷 亮平</ja>), who acts in both Japanese and Korean films and dramas.
sourceReadingMnemonic: Unlike most Japanese names, this one actually uses the on'yomi of both kanji. You should be able to read this on your own. Yay for easy names!
